organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Both areas tend to more laden with friction in free trade negotiations than tariff reduction .

Let's think step by step.

1. Free trade negotiations: This is a process or an organization involved in negotiating and establishing free trade agreements between countries.
2. Tariff reduction: This refers to the reduction or elimination of tariffs (taxes on imported goods) by governments as part of a trade agreement. It can be considered an action or goal of an organization (i.e., governments involved in the negotiations).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.
1. Free trade negotiations: This is an organization involved in negotiating and establishing free trade agreements between countries.
